summary: This mod adds 2 shields from the [b]beautiful[/b] iOS game Infinity Blade.
descriptionHtml:
Update: Elith has been updated and some more screens have been added, check the user-images for those.
-----
[b]Details:[/b]
This mod adds 2 shields from the [b]beautiful[/b] iOS game Infinity Blade. They can be crafted at any forge, and tempered, as usual. Both shields have the same stats as ebony, however there is no perk requirement as those annoy me.

Both have high res 2048x2048 textures that I am rather proud of, and are modelled from scratch using blender.
[b] Dorn:[/b] Requires 2 ebony ingots, 1 silver ingot and 1 leather strip. Temper with 1 ebony ingot.
[b] Elith:[/b] Requires 2 steel ingots, 1 silver ingot, 1 quicksilver ingot, and 1 leather strip. Temper with 1 quicksilver ingot.

If you like this mod, please consider showing your appreciation by a comment or an endorsement, I have a burning need for other people to recognize my ego :)

[b]Installation[/b]
[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/How_to_install_Skyrim_mods]How to install -> Manual installation[/url]

[b]Known Issues[/b]
None. Please message me or leave a comment if you find one.

[b]Permissions[/b]
Please message me. I\'m likely to say yes, but I do want to know what my work is being used for.
author: FakePersonality
